doc.name: NCCompositeActor
doc.description:
A composite actor in the PtinyOS domain with no ports. This actor is always a type opaque composite actor.

This actor represents a nesC component with no interfaces and no .nc implementation. See ptolemy.domains.ptinyos.kernel.PtinyOSDirector for more information on nesC. This actor should be used when it is not necessary to have typed ports that interface to regular Ptolemy II models. If typed ports are needed, then an actor that implements ptolemy.domains.ptinyos.kernel.PtinyOSCompositeActor should be used.

NCCompositeActor is used as a place holder for nesC (.nc) code that the user must write separately in an editor like ptolemy.domains.ptinyos.gui.NCCompositeActorTableauFactory. The user should add ports in the GUI as necessary when adding nesC interfaces to their nesC component. These ports should connect to other nesC components.
